name: Protocol Xeno: Excavate!
description:
Do you like Earth? Do you hate Aliens?

This is the game for you!

Welcome to the Galactic Rumble! Earth has been signed up for an all out battle between laser wielding, junk shooting, missile launching, alien ships! Prepare Earth through hollowing out resources, and using them to create your own insane defenses. Be careful though, mine too much and you'll be scrap for the galaxy! Earth can be healed with metal infill, but your mines will not stop running. A hollowed Earth is a DEAD Earth. 

See how long you can last in this twin-stick shooter, get addicted with these clicker aspects, and teach those aliens a lesson! 

Don't forget to check for information on the items you buy! Some Items are REQUIRED to move and rotate!

Controls:

PC:

- Aim: Mouse

- Shoot: Left Mouse Button

- Move: WASD

- Shop: Tab or Click Shop Tab

- Pause: Esc or Click Pause Button

Touch:

- Aim: Left Joystick

- Shoot: Left Joystick

- Move: Right Joystick

- Shop: Press Tab Button

- Pause: Press Pause Button

This game is the product of hard work from high school students! Made in a 2 week game jam for the Warren Tech game development program, we stayed up and struggled to make this game a reality! We hope you enjoy!
